row1.title: What is L1, L2, L3 Tier System of Remote IT Support?
row1.desc: The L1, L2, L3 tier system in remote IT support denotes different levels of expertise. L1 handles basic issues like password resets, L2 deals with more complex problems, while L3 resolves intricate technical issues requiring advanced troubleshooting skills.

row2.title: What are Architecture Design principles? How does Agile Methodology aligns with it?
row2.desc: Architecture Design principles shape system structure; Agile adapts to change with iterative development, aligning for flexible design.

row3.title: What is the role of Domain-driven Design (DDD) in Agile Architecture and how it helps in defining bounded contexts and microservices?
row3.desc: Domain-driven Design (DDD) in Agile Architecture defines boundaries (bounded contexts) aligning with business domains, facilitating microservices design for scalable, cohesive systems.
